column5: Hey everyone  Well the ice season has been dismal to say the least. The ice conditions are really unstable and not much of a surprise with the weather we've been having. I have been out checking the ice and playing a bit and was fortunate to get into some decent lakers already this season.  Xzone swammers and Bass magnet tubes in pearl have been our best producers.  here's a bit of Laker porn...                               Here are a couple video's for anyone looking to pass some time...           Lets hope the season gets going sooner or later...  tightlines  Ryan
Beauties!   It is nice to see people finally getting the opportunity to get out to the laker grounds.
You guys slayed them.  Right on!
Nothing shabby bout those results Ryan!
Beauty fish!!!  Great job!  I love the last pic!  Trout Gun!
Epic battle on the big trout...  Thanks for the pics and vids...
That was totally awesome Ryan.  Second vid was very cool.
Just had a chance to watch the videos, very nice and great tunes as well. Nice to see I'm not the only one who favours a longer rod than most.
Couple pics look like a stick and a puck might have been a good idea as well
NICE FISH... I'M JITTERING...GOING TO GB THIS WEEKEND,HOPING TO GET A FEW
Very nice lakers guys , that second video is great
